verses.name: Revelation 21:16
verses.text: And the city lieth foursquare, and the length is as large as the breadth: and he measured the city with the reed, twelve thousand furlongs. The length and the breadth and the height of it are equal.

verses.name: Revelation 21:17
verses.text: And he measured the wall thereof, an hundred and forty and four cubits, according to the measure of a man, that is, of the angel.

verses.name: Revelation 21:18
verses.text: And the building of the wall of it was of jasper: and the city was pure gold, like unto clear glass.
